title: Welcome
description: Siling Parisi provides safe, effective Chinese Herbal Therapy and fertility acupuncture treatment in Merrick and Bay Shore, NY. - Welcome
cleaned_text: Harmony & Balance Acupuncture Clinic is full scale Chinese Medicine Clinic specialize acupuncture and Chinese Herbal therapy with a reputation for excellent patient care and positive treatment results, also is a clinic for the mind, body, and soul - a place where wellness and relaxation blend with an atmosphere of serenity. Two locations are in Wantagh and Bay Shore of Long Island. Our primary goal is to restore your health as quickly as possible through holistic , sensitive, non-invasive and cost-effective approach that integrates acupuncture(including no-needle acupuncture therapies) with Chinese herbal medicine, nutrition and dietary instruction, We believe that each individual is unique and has a unique combination of symptoms and oveall health. When you visit us, we complete an in depth evaluation and diagnosis base on TCM philosophy and principles, determine overall state of health and identify disharmonies in the body. We then formulate an individual treatment plan to help you regain healthy energetic balance to clear the cause of the illness, but also benefit overall health. We also offer preventive health care treatment program that emphasis on maintaining balance to strength the immunity system and preventing diseases from occurring. At our Asian-inspired clinic, you can be assured that we will give you the specialized attention you can find nowhere else, so that your health issue will be addressed on a personal level with a treatment plan that is tailored and monitored by us carefully. We have successfully treated a wide variety of health issues and specializes in: Pain Management: Nerve Pain, Headache, Muscle-Joint Pain...... Most of patients experience 50-100% pain relief with only one treatment. Natural Fertiliy & IVF Support: Unexplained Infertility, LPD, Advanced Maternal Age, Endometriosis and PCOS POF, Immunologic Reaction and Recurrent Miscarriage , Male-factor infertility...... We has been very successful in helping a many of patients achieve their dream of having baby . Emotional Stress Relieve: Anxiety, Depression, Sleep Disorder.....
